#summary Alphabetical list of subcommands
#labels Featured
|| *Command*                            || *Description* ||
||[BaseExtension           clone       ]|| Clone an existing TaskType ||
||[AutotoolsExtension      configure   ]|| Set up a build directory and run `configure` ||
||[BaseExtension           delete      ]|| Delete a TaskType ||
||[BaseExtension           edit        ]|| Edit a TaskType ||
||[BaseExtension           load        ]|| Load a TaskType into a new directory ||
||[AutotoolsExtension      make        ]|| Run `make` in the build directory ||
||[BaseExtension           new         ]|| Create a new TaskType ||
||[BaseExtension           tasks       ]|| List all [TaskType]s ||
||[BaseExtension           var         ]|| Display/query Dev variables ||
||[VirtualenvExtension     virtualenv  ]|| Activate a virtualenv sandbox ||
